nodes.text: Talon Squadron was a T-wing squadron commanded by Nami Crime Lord Ali Tarrak.

The Squadron was used by Tarrak to provide cover for Y-wings from Boegis Squadron to disable 3 Imperial Modified corvettes called Hashim. After disabling them, a Corellian transport, Dhoora boarded and captured Hashim 1, which contained a TIE Defender prototype. The strike team then escaped into Hyperspace.
